localResource.name: VM_type
localResource.label: VM_type
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT v3_2_enum_translator.value, v3_2_enum_translator.enum_key, 0 as sort FROM v3_2_enum_translator, v3_2_configuration_history_vms WHERE v3_2_configuration_history_vms.vm_type = v3_2_enum_translator.enum_key AND v3_2_enum_translator.enum_type = 'VM_TYPE' AND v3_2_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id in (SELECT v3_2_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id FROM v3_2_configuration_history_clusters WHERE v3_2_configuration_history_clusters.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid)) AND v3_2_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id = CASE $P{P_Cluster_ID} WHEN '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' THEN v3_2_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id ELSE cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as uuid) END $P!{Active_VMs} UNION SELECT DISTINCT value, -1, 1 FROM v3_2_enum_translator WHERE enum_type = 'REPORTS_ALL' AND enum_key = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC, value
